paper_abstract: It is NP-complete to calculate the jump number on an interval order. There are three algorithms reaching 3/2 approximation ratio for this problem. Recently, Krysztowiak improved this ratio to 89/60. We investigate their algorithm carefully and bound this ratio by 16/11. (C) 2015 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A refined analysis on the jump number problem of interval orders
